predictions.text: Currently, We do not respond to “Do Not Track” signals because We are trying to provide you with a personalized experience

predictions.text: We use session cookies that expire at the end of a browser session (from when a user opens the browser window to when they exit the browser) and persistent cookies that remain on your hard drive until you erase them or they expire
